notes: Seti Astro Suite Pro V1.4.7 Stacking Suite: Much faster alignment, use the wrench icon to set the max control points and star detection threshold: 100 points and threshold of 20 will be very fast but potentially less accurate distortion warps. PixelMath preview and autostretch options. Display-Stretch more options. WIMS updates. FunctionBundle Niceties. Other bug fixes.
